General.Name: Liuzhou Chemical Industry Co Ltd
General.Description: Liuzhou Chemical Industry Co., Ltd. produces and sells chemical fertilizers in China. Its principal products include synthetic ammonia, hydrogen peroxide, and others. The company also exports its products. Liuzhou Chemical Industry Co., Ltd. was founded in 1967 and is based in Liuzhou, China.

3.Name: Ms. Liping  Long
3.Title: Sec. of the Board of Directors
